metadata.title: CVE-2024-44938 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:jfs: Fix shift-out-of-bounds in dbDiscardAGWhen searching for the next smaller log2 block, BLKSTOL2() returned 0,causing shift exponent -1 to be negative.This patch fixes the issue by exiting the loop directly when negativeshift is found.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
